verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> on the same <S%G846><s%> occasion <S%G2540><s%> there were some <S%G5100><s%> present <S%G3918><s%> who reported <S%G518><s%> to Him about <S%G4012><s%> the Galileans, <S%G1057><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> had mingled <S%G3396><s%> with their sacrifices. <S%G2378><s%>

And He answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Do you suppose <S%G1380><s%> that these <S%G3778><s%> Galileans <S%G1057><s%> were [greater] sinners <S%G268><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> [other] Galileans, <S%G1057><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they suffered <S%G3958><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> [fate?]
"I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, no, <S%G3780><s%> but unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> you repent, <S%G3340><s%> you will all <S%G3956><s%> likewise <S%G3668><s%> perish. <S%G622><s%>

"Or <S%G2228><s%> do you suppose <S%G1380><s%> that those <S%G1565><s%> eighteen <S%G7037><s%> on whom <S%G3739><s%> the tower <S%G4444><s%> in Siloam <S%G4611><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> and killed <S%G615><s%> them, were [worse] culprits <S%G3781><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the men <S%G444><s%> who live <S%G2730><s%> in Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>?
"I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, no, <S%G3780><s%> but unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> you repent, <S%G3340><s%> you will all <S%G3956><s%> likewise <S%G5615><s%> perish. <S%G622><s%>"

And He [began] telling <S%G3004><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> parable: <S%G3850><s%> "A certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> a fig <S%G4808><s%> tree <S%G4808><s%> which had been planted <S%G5452><s%> in his vineyard; <S%G290><s%> and he came <S%G2064><s%> looking <S%G2212><s%> for fruit <S%G2590><s%> on it, and did not find <S%G2147><s%> any.

"And he said <S%G3004><s%> to the vineyard-keeper, 'Behold, <S%G2400><s%> for three <S%G5140><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> I have come <S%G2064><s%> looking <S%G2212><s%> for fruit <S%G2590><s%> on this <S%G3778><s%> fig <S%G4808><s%> tree <S%G4808><s%> without <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> finding <S%G2147><s%> any. Cut <S%G1581><s%> it down! <S%G1581><s%> Why <S%G2444><s%> does it even <S%G2532><s%> use <S%G2673><s%> up the ground <S%G1093><s%>?'

"And he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, 'Let <S%G863><s%> it alone, <S%G863><s%> sir, <S%G2962><s%> for this <S%G3778><s%> year <S%G2094><s%> too, <S%G2532><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> I dig <S%G4626><s%> around <S%G4012><s%> it and put <S%G906><s%> in fertilizer; <S%G2874><s%>
and if <S%G2579><s%> it bears <S%G4160><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> next <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3195><s%> year, [fine;] but if <S%G1487><s%> not, cut <S%G1581><s%> it down. <S%G1581><s%>' "
And He was teaching <S%G1321><s%> in one <S%G1520><s%> of the synagogues <S%G4864><s%> on the Sabbath. <S%G4521><s%>

And behold, <S%G2400><s%> there was a woman <S%G1135><s%> who for eighteen <S%G7037><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> had had <S%G2192><s%> a sickness <S%G769><s%> caused by a spirit; <S%G4151><s%> and she was bent <S%G4794><s%> double, <S%G4794><s%> and could <S%G1410><s%> not straighten <S%G352><s%> up at all. <S%G3838><s%>

And when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> her, He called <S%G4377><s%> her over <S%G4377><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to her, "Woman, <S%G1135><s%> you are freed <S%G630><s%> from your sickness. <S%G769><s%>"

And He laid <S%G2007><s%> His hands <S%G5495><s%> upon her; and immediately <S%G3916><s%> she was made <S%G461><s%> erect <S%G461><s%> again, <S%G461><s%> and [began] glorifying <S%G1392><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

And the synagogue <S%G752><s%> official, <S%G752><s%> indignant <S%G23><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had healed <S%G2323><s%> on the Sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> [began] saying <S%G3004><s%> to the multitude <S%G3793><s%> in response, <S%G611><s%> "There are six <S%G1803><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> in which <S%G3739><s%> work <S%G2038><s%> should <S%G1163><s%> be done; <S%G2038><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> during <S%G1722><s%> them and get <S%G2323><s%> healed, <S%G2323><s%> and not on the Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>"

But the Lord <S%G2962><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him and said, <S%G3004><s%> "You hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> does not each <S%G1538><s%> of you on the Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> untie <S%G3089><s%> his ox <S%G1016><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his donkey <S%G3688><s%> from the stall, <S%G5336><s%> and lead <S%G520><s%> him away <S%G520><s%> to water <S%G4222><s%> [him?]

"And this <S%G3778><s%> woman, <S%G3778><s%> a daughter <S%G2364><s%> of Abraham <S%G11><s%> as she is, whom <S%G3739><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> has bound <S%G1210><s%> for eighteen <S%G1176><s%> <S%G3638><s%> long <S%G2400><s%> years, <S%G2094><s%> should <S%G1163><s%> she not have been released <S%G3089><s%> from this <S%G3778><s%> bond <S%G1199><s%> on the Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>?"

And as He said <S%G3004><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> His opponents <S%G480><s%> were being humiliated; <S%G2617><s%> and the entire <S%G3956><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> was rejoicing <S%G5463><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the glorious <S%G1741><s%> things <S%G1741><s%> being <S%G1096><s%> done <S%G1096><s%> by Him.

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> He was saying, <S%G3004><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> is the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> like, <S%G3664><s%> and to what <S%G5101><s%> shall I compare <S%G3666><s%> it?

"It is like <S%G3664><s%> a mustard <S%G4615><s%> seed, <S%G2848><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> and threw <S%G906><s%> into his own <S%G1438><s%> garden; <S%G2779><s%> and it grew <S%G837><s%> and became <S%G1096><s%> a tree; <S%G1186><s%> and the birds <S%G4071><s%> of the air <S%G3772><s%> nested <S%G2681><s%> in its branches. <S%G2798><s%>"
And again <S%G3825><s%> He said, <S%G3004><s%> "To what <S%G5101><s%> shall I compare <S%G3666><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>?

"It is like <S%G3664><s%> leaven, <S%G2219><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> and hid <S%G2928><s%> in three <S%G5140><s%> pecks <S%G4568><s%> of meal, <S%G224><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> it was all <S%G3650><s%> leavened. <S%G2220><s%>"

And He was passing <S%G1279><s%> through <S%G1279><s%> from one city <S%G4172><s%> and village <S%G2968><s%> to another, <S%G2596><s%> teaching, <S%G1321><s%> and proceeding <S%G4160><s%> on His way <S%G4197><s%> to Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%>
And someone <S%G5100><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> are there [just] a few <S%G3641><s%> who are being saved <S%G4982><s%>?" And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them,

"Strive <S%G75><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> by the narrow <S%G4728><s%> door; <S%G2374><s%> for many, <S%G4183><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, will seek <S%G2212><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> and will not be able. <S%G2480><s%>

"Once <S%G575><s%> <S%G3739><s%> the head <S%G3617><s%> of the house <S%G3617><s%> gets <S%G1453><s%> up and shuts <S%G608><s%> the door, <S%G2374><s%> and you begin <S%G757><s%> to stand <S%G2476><s%> outside <S%G1854><s%> and knock <S%G2925><s%> on the door, <S%G2374><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'Lord, <S%G2962><s%> open <S%G455><s%> up to us!' then <S%G2532><s%> He will answer <S%G611><s%> and say <S%G3004><s%> to you, 'I do not know <S%G3609><s%> where <S%G4159><s%> you are from.'

"Then <S%G5119><s%> you will begin <S%G757><s%> to say, <S%G3004><s%> 'We ate <S%G2068><s%> and drank <S%G4095><s%> in Your presence, <S%G1799><s%> and You taught <S%G1321><s%> in our streets <S%G4116><s%>';
and He will say, <S%G3004><s%> 'I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, I do not know <S%G3609><s%> where <S%G4159><s%> you are from; depart <S%G868><s%> from Me, all <S%G3956><s%> you evildoers. <S%G93><s%>'

"There will be weeping <S%G2805><s%> and gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth <S%G3599><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> you see <S%G3708><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> and Isaac <S%G2464><s%> and Jacob <S%G2384><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> in the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> but yourselves <S%G4771><s%> being cast <S%G1544><s%> out.

"And they will come <S%G2240><s%> from east <S%G395><s%> and west, <S%G1424><s%> and from north <S%G1005><s%> and south, <S%G3558><s%> and will recline <S%G347><s%> [at the table] in the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
"And behold, <S%G2400><s%> [some] are last <S%G2078><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> will be first <S%G4413><s%> and [some] are first <S%G4413><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> will be last. <S%G2078><s%>"

Just <S%G846><s%> at that time <S%G5610><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> up, saying <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Go <S%G1831><s%> away <S%G1831><s%> and depart <S%G4198><s%> from here, <S%G1782><s%> for Herod <S%G2264><s%> wants <S%G2309><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> You."

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Go <S%G4198><s%> and tell <S%G3004><s%> that fox, <S%G258><s%> 'Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I cast <S%G1544><s%> out demons <S%G1140><s%> and perform <S%G658><s%> cures <S%G2392><s%> today <S%G4594><s%> and tomorrow, <S%G839><s%> and the third <S%G5154><s%> [day] I reach <S%G5048><s%> My goal. <S%G5048><s%>'

"Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> I must <S%G1163><s%> journey <S%G4198><s%> on today <S%G4594><s%> and tomorrow <S%G839><s%> and the next <S%G2192><s%> [day;] for it cannot <S%G1735><s%> <S%G3756><s%> be that a prophet <S%G4396><s%> should perish <S%G622><s%> outside <S%G1854><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

"O Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> [the city] that kills <S%G615><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> and stones <S%G3036><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> to her! How <S%G4212><s%> often <S%G4212><s%> I wanted <S%G2309><s%> to gather <S%G1996><s%> your children <S%G5043><s%> together, <S%G1996><s%> just <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5158><s%> as a hen <S%G3733><s%> [gathers] her brood <S%G3555><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> her wings, <S%G4420><s%> and you would <S%G2309><s%> not [have it!]

"Behold, <S%G2400><s%> your house <S%G3624><s%> is left <S%G863><s%> to you [desolate;] and I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, you shall not see <S%G3708><s%> Me until <S%G2193><s%> [the time] comes <S%G2240><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> you say, <S%G3004><s%> 'Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is He who comes <S%G2064><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord! <S%G2962><s%>'"
